job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Finance, or related field (MBA or relevant certification like PMP or PgMP preferred)

jd:
From: shweta, zealhire shweta@zealhire.com Reply to: shweta@zealhire.com econdary SkillsSr Program Manager w..Job DescriptionUSC/GCneed LinkedIn We are seeking a Senior Program Manager with extensive experience in the financial industry to lead and manage strategic projects from initiation to completion. This individual will play a key role in driving project success, aligning business goals with project deliverables, and ensuring that all initiatives are executed on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards.

Key Responsibilities:

Program Leadership: Lead, oversee, and manage multiple projects within a larger program in a financial environment, ensuring alignment with organizational objectives and regulatory standards.

Stakeholder Management: Establish strong relationships with internal and external stakeholders, including executive leadership, cross-functional teams, and clients, to facilitate program success.

Project Planning & Execution: Define project scope, goals, and deliverables, and develop comprehensive project plans that align with business objectives.

Risk & Issue Management: Identify, assess, and mitigate risks and issues that could impact program objectives; develop contingency plans as needed.

Financial Management: Oversee budgets, forecasts, and financial performance, ensuring effective cost management and alignment with financial targets.

Compliance & Reporting: Ensure all projects adhere to financial regulations and compliance requirements, providing regular updates and reports to stakeholders.

Required Qualifications:

Experience: Minimum of 10+ years in program/project management, with at least 5 years in the financial sector.

Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Finance, or related field (MBA or relevant certification like PMP or PgMP preferred).

Skills: Strong understanding of financial services, including regulatory compliance and risk management. Proven track record of successfully managing large-scale, cross-functional programs. Excellent leadership, organizational, and communication skills. Proficiency in project management tools (e.g., MS Project, JIRA, etc.).
